trans-unit.source: The unfortunates so transformed hungered not for flesh, but for warmth.

trans-unit.source: "Tresserhorn is ours now. Dredge the lake and bring me all the bones you find. We'll build you a new army, the likes of which Terisiare has never seen."\n—Heidar, Rimewind master, to Haakon
trans-unit.target: 「崔瑟洪城是我们的了。 把湖底好好挖一遍，将所有找出来的骨骸都交给我。 我将为你打造一支军队，保证是泰瑞西亚前所未见。」 ～霜风会首领亥达告诉赫肯

trans-unit.source: Flying, haste\nWhenever a creature dealt damage by CARDNAME this turn is put into a graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Garza Zol.\nWhenever Garza Zol deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 飞行，敏捷 每当本回合中曾受到CARDNAME伤害的一个生物置入坟墓场时，在嘉莎佐上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 每当嘉莎佐对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CSP·130 | Juniper Order Ranger | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Juniper Order Ranger
trans-unit.target: 杜松教派护林人

trans-unit.resname: CSP·130 | Juniper Order Ranger | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature comes into play under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature and a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个生物在你的操控下进场时，在该生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物，并在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: CSP·130 | Juniper Order Ranger | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: To protect the alliance between Kjeldor and Yavimaya, they trained in the ways of both.
trans-unit.target: 为守护奇亚多与亚维马雅的同盟，他们的训练综合两方的特色。

trans-unit.source: Sek'Kuar, Deathkeeper
trans-unit.target: 死亡守卫赛夸

trans-unit.resname: CSP·131 | Sek'Kuar, Deathkeeper | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever another nontoken creature you control is put into a graveyard from play, put a 3/1 black and red Graveborn creature token with haste into play.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个由你操控之非衍生物的生物从场上进入坟墓场时，将一个3/1，黑红双色，具敏捷异能的墓生衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.source: Karplusan legend told of an orc so cruel that he burned his own followers in rage—yet so revered that they rose from their pyres to serve him.
trans-unit.target: 卡普路桑的传说中，有个残虐半兽人一怒之下烧死自己的追随者～而他却也极受崇敬，连遭焚者都从葬火中复生，再为其效命。

trans-unit.source: Tamanoa
trans-unit.target: 塔玛诺亚

trans-unit.source: Whenever a noncreature source you control deals damage, you gain that much life.
trans-unit.target: 每当由你操控的非生物来源造成伤害时，你获得等量的生命。

trans-unit.source: When Freyalise spoke the World Spell, the tamanoa rose to bring a new morning to Terisiare.
trans-unit.target: 当妃雅丽兹吟诵圆世咒，塔玛诺亚随之现身，为泰瑞西亚带来全新黎明。

trans-unit.resname: CSP·133 | Vanish into Memory | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Vanish into Memory
trans-unit.target: 褪入记忆

trans-unit.resname: CSP·133 | Vanish into Memory | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Remove target creature from the game. You draw cards equal to that creature's power. At the beginning of your next upkeep, return that card to play under its owner's control. If you do, discard cards equal to its toughness.
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物移出对战。 你抓若干牌，其数量等同于该生物的力量。 在你下个维持开始时，将该牌在其拥有者的操控下返回场上。 若你如此作，则弃若干牌，其数量等同于该生物的防御力。

trans-unit.resname: CSP·133 | Vanish into Memory | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Out of sight, into mind.
trans-unit.target: 眼不见，心挂念。

trans-unit.source: Wilderness Elemental
trans-unit.target: 野性元素

trans-unit.resname: CSP·134 | Wilderness Elemental | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nCARDNAME's power is equal to the number of nonbasic lands your opponents control.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 CARDNAME的力量等同于由所有对手操控的非基本地数量。

trans-unit.source: "Don't be so quick to reclaim the thawing lands. They might have acquired a taste for freedom."\n—Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter
trans-unit.target: 「别急着去开垦解冻大地。 它们可能已迷上自由的滋味。」 ～凯辛柯地精猎手塔维堤

trans-unit.resname: CSP·135 | Zur the Enchanter | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Zur the Enchanter
trans-unit.target: 结界大师祖尔

trans-unit.resname: CSP·135 | Zur the Enchanter | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, you may search your library for an enchantment card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put it into play. If you do, shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张总法术力费用等于或小于3的结界牌，并将它放置进场。 若你如此作，则将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: CSP·135 | Zur the Enchanter | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Zur remained aloof from Terisiare's suffering, intent only on his own perfection.
trans-unit.target: 祖尔对泰瑞西亚的苦难视而不见，只顾着追求自身完美。

trans-unit.source: Coldsteel Heart
trans-unit.target: 寒钢核心

trans-unit.resname: CSP·136 | Coldsteel Heart | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME comes into play tapped.\nAs CARDNAME comes into play, choose a color.\n{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进场。 于CARDNAME进场时，选择一个颜色。 {T}：加一点该色之法术力到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: The Phyrexian death machine awoke, its coldsteel heart imbuing it with sinister new power.
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚的杀戮机械已起动，其寒钢核心将活跃的恶毒力量灌注全身。

trans-unit.source: Jester's Scepter
trans-unit.target: 小丑权杖

trans-unit.resname: CSP·137 | Jester's Scepter | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, remove the top five cards of target player's library from the game face down. You may look at those cards as long as they remain removed from the game.\n{2}, {T}, Put a card removed from the game with CARDNAME into its owner's graveyard: Counter target spell if it has the same name as that card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，将目标牌手牌库顶的五张牌以牌面朝下的方式移出对战。 只要这些牌持续被移出对战，你便可以检视这些牌。 {2}，{T}，将一张以CARDNAME移出对战的牌置入其拥有者之坟墓场：如果目标咒语的名称与该牌相同，则反击之。

trans-unit.source: Mishra's Bauble
trans-unit.target: 米斯拉的饰品

trans-unit.resname: CSP·138 | Mishra's Bauble | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Look at the top card of target player's library. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲CARDNAME：检视目标牌手的牌库顶牌。 在下回合维持开始时抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Arcum is a babbling fool! Phyrexian technology is our greatest blessing. Take this delightful trinket for instance . . ."\n—Heidar, Rimewind master
trans-unit.target: 「阿肯真是爱唠叨的蠢材！ 非瑞克西亚的技术是上天送来的宝贵礼物。 比如这精致的饰品. . .」 ～霜风会首领亥达

trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Ironfoot
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚千斤脚

trans-unit.resname: CSP·139 | Phyrexian Ironfoot | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME doesn't untap during your untap step.\n{1}{S}: Untap CARDNAME. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME于你的重置步骤中不能重置。 {1}{S}：重置CARDNAME。 （{S}能以产自雪境永久物的一点法术力来支付。）

trans-unit.source: It took the Rimewind cultists days to realize they had successfully activated the creature—it just wasn't interested in moving.
trans-unit.target: 霜风会众花了好几天才明白，原来自己早就成功起动这生物～它只是不爱动。

trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Snowcrusher
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚破雪械

trans-unit.resname: CSP·140 | Phyrexian Snowcrusher | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME attacks each turn if able.\n{1}{S}: CARDNAME gets +1/+0 until end of turn. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME每回合若能攻击，则必须攻击。 {1}{S}：CARDNAME得+1/+0直到回合结束。 （{S}能以产自雪境永久物的一点法术力来支付。）

trans-unit.source: Its plow wasn't designed for snow, but to carve a path through shrieking armies.
trans-unit.target: 上面的犁头并非为除雪设计，而是用来在尖叫逃离的敌军中间开路。

trans-unit.source: Phyrexian Soulgorger
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚吞魂械

trans-unit.resname: CSP·141 | Phyrexian Soulgorger | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Cumulative upkeep—\nSacrifice a creature. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: 累积维持～牺牲一个生物。 （在你的维持开始时，在此永久物上放置一个岁月指示物，然后除非你为其上每个岁月指示物各支付其维持费用，否则牺牲之。）

trans-unit.source: The Phyrexian minds that constructed it did not live past its awakening.
trans-unit.target: 组装它的非瑞克西亚人没能活着看它醒来。

trans-unit.source: Thrumming Stone
trans-unit.target: 嗡响碑石

trans-unit.resname: CSP·142 | Thrumming Stone | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Spells you control have ripple 4. (Whenever you play a spell, you may reveal the top four cards of your library. You may play any revealed cards with the same name as the spell without paying their mana costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your library.)
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的咒语具有涟动4。 （当你使用任一咒语时，你可以展示你牌库顶的四张牌。 你可以使用所展示之牌中与该咒语同名者，并且不需支付其法术力费用。 将其余的牌置于你牌库底。）

trans-unit.source: Arctic Flats
trans-unit.target: 极地平野

trans-unit.resname: CSP·143 | Arctic Flats | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME comes into play tapped.\n{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进场。 {T}：加{G}或{W}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source:
"A realm once green now ruled by Frost,
Where flesh and field both pay its cost.
Those dearly loved, forever lost . . ."
—*The Dynasty of Winter Kings*
trans-unit.target: 「翠绿国度寒霜封冻， 生灵大地齐遭苦痛。 挚爱竟难永同与共. . .」 ～严冬王朝

trans-unit.source: Boreal Shelf
trans-unit.target: 波利尔冰棚

trans-unit.resname: CSP·144 | Boreal Shelf | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME comes into play tapped.\n{T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进场。 {T}：加{W}或{U}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source:
"Who will stay the Tyrant's hand,
As ice and woe both grip our land?
The helpless feel his frozen brand."
—*The Dynasty of Winter Kings*
trans-unit.target: 「谁愿臣服专横暴君， 坐视寒悲徘徊经旬？ 唯能怯受寒澈烙印。」 ～严冬王朝

trans-unit.source: Dark Depths
trans-unit.target: 黑暗深渊

trans-unit.resname: CSP·145 | Dark Depths | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME comes into play with ten ice counters on it.\n{3}: Remove an ice counter from CARDNAME.\nWhen CARDNAME has no ice counters on it, sacrifice it. If you do, put an indestructible legendary 20/20 black Avatar creature token with flying named Marit Lage into play.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进场时上面有十个寒冰指示物。 {3}：从CARDNAME上移去一个寒冰指示物。 当CARDNAME上没有寒冰指示物时，将之牺牲。 若你如此作，则将一个传奇的20/20，名称为玛莉雷基，具飞行异能且不会毁坏的黑色圣者衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.source: Frost Marsh
trans-unit.target: 寒霜沼

trans-unit.resname: CSP·146 | Frost Marsh | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME comes into play tapped.\n{T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进场。 {T}：加{U}或{B}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source:
"Now caged in Winter's bitter chill,
Our people cry, their voices shrill—
Eternal cold breaks down their will."
—*The Dynasty of Winter Kings*
trans-unit.target: 「严冬凛寒咨意囚系， 人民悲号，其音凄厉～ 无尽严寒溃碎志意。」 ～严冬王朝

trans-unit.source: Highland Weald
trans-unit.target: 高地林野

trans-unit.resname: CSP·147 | Highland Weald | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME comes into play tapped.\n{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进场。 {T}：加{R}或{G}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source:
"Our noble land, enslaved by Rime,
Is it our fate to freeze through time?
If this be true, oh wicked crime."
—*The Dynasty of Winter Kings*
trans-unit.target: 「壮丽山河冽霜肆令， 寒颤苟延焉为天定？ 此般恶行定非宿命。」 ～严冬王朝

trans-unit.resname: CSP·148 | Mouth of Ronom | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mouth of Ronom
trans-unit.target: 若纳山口

trans-unit.resname: CSP·148 | Mouth of Ronom | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.\n{4}{S}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: CARDNAME deals 4 damage to target creature. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。 {4}{S}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：CARDNAME对目标生物造成4点伤害。 （{S}能以产自雪境永久物的一点法术力来支付。）

trans-unit.source: Scrying Sheets
trans-unit.target: 占卜冰镜

trans-unit.resname: CSP·149 | Scrying Sheets | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.\n{1}{S}, {T}: Look at the top card of your library. If that card is snow, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. ({S} can be paid with one mana from a snow permanent.)
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。 {1}{S}，{T}：检视你的牌库顶牌。 若该牌是雪境牌，你可以展示该牌并置于你手上。 （{S}能以产自雪境永久物的一点法术力来支付。）

trans-unit.source: Tresserhorn Sinks
trans-unit.target: 崔瑟洪陷坑

trans-unit.resname: CSP·150 | Tresserhorn Sinks | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME comes into play tapped.\n{T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进场。 {T}：加{B}或{R}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source:
"Our land oppressed by silent Cold,
We weary wretches, young and old,
Pray that Springtime loose his hold."
—*The Dynasty of Winter Kings*
trans-unit.target: 「肃杀严寒压迫大地， 霸凌横夺吾人气力， 但祈春日早现寸碧。」 ～严冬王朝
